overview: Mr. Korkus is responsible for all aspects of product research, design, development and quality assurance. Mr. Korkus, together with Mr. Faitelson, conceived and architected the metadata framework technology that now serves as the foundation for the Varonis Data Governance Suite, and is the creator of several patents for permissions visualization, simulation, and data analysis. Under his leadership, the company has assembled a world-class research and development organization with deep experience spanning digital collaboration, storage, networking and security. Prior to Varonis, Mr. Korkus was responsible for the architecture, design and development of global data management and networking infrastructure with NetVision and Network Appliance.
